column1: EVTDESC96151;The great powers have called a summit to discuss our recent bout of aggression and agreed for sanctions against us. They say they do not covet any of our land and only seek to cull our aggression. /n/n They threaten that any more aggression will be met with tougher penalties.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC96152;The great powers convene again and one of the representatives stands and professes "Even though large tracts of Europe and many old and famous States have fallen or may fall into the grip of $COUNTRY$ and all the odious apparatus of $COUNTRY_ADJ$ rule
column2: we shall not flag or fail. We shall go on to the end. We shall fight in Europe
column3: we shall fight on the seas and oceans
column4: we shall fight with growing confidence and growing strength
column6: whatever the cost may be. We shall fight on the beaches
column7: we shall fight on the landing grounds
column8: we shall fight in the fields and in the streets
column9: we shall fight in the hills; we shall never surrender
column11: which I do not for a moment believe
column12: this land or a large part of it were subjugated and starving
column13: then our Empire beyond the seas
column14: armed and guarded by our Fleet
column19: with all its power and might
column20: steps forth to the rescue and the liberation of the old." With this the representative sits down to a roar of applause. The time for talks is over.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC96153;Now that we lay defeated the great powers feel comfortable lifting the economic sanctions.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
